remarks: Operating on both sides of two inequalities, when the operation is consistent with ` <Q ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 6-Oct-2019.)
statement:
genplt2i.ord $e |- ( ( x e. Q. /\ y e. Q. /\ z e. Q. ) -> ( x <Q y <-> ( z G x ) <Q ( z G y ) ) ) $.
genplt2i.com $e |- ( ( x e. Q. /\ y e. Q. ) -> ( x G y ) = ( y G x ) ) $.
genplt2i $p |- ( ( A <Q B /\ C <Q D ) -> ( A G C ) <Q ( B G D ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d D x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
